item.title: Luke Davis Interview
item.dc:creator: Stephan Fitzpatrick
item.description:
Today we had a chance to sit down and talk to Luke Davis from Planet Labs. Planet Labs launched with the idea of imaging every spot on the planet every day. They have now launched more satellites in to orbit than any other organization in the world and are devoted to using their platform to improve our Earth. Luke's recent projects involve a large Django web application that allows satellite operators to have a web-based gui to control the entire network of spacecraft! His typical development environment involves Vagrant virtual enviroments, private git repos, and lots of Python.

Read moreâ€¦ (3 min remaining to read)
